mapper.select: SELECT sc.id AS id, sc.cart_id AS cartId, sc.user_id AS userId, p.product_image AS productImage, p.id As productId, p.price AS productPrice, scp.product_num AS productNum FROM s_user u JOIN s_shop_cart sc ON u.user_id = sc.user_id JOIN s_shop_cart_product scp ON sc.cart_id = scp.shop_cart_id JOIN s_product p ON scp.product_id = p.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
